moves.effect: On hit, the target gets a Seed Coat. The Coat has the following ability: At the beginning of your turn, if you are within 20 ft of the enemy who gave you the Seed Coat, you lose 1d12 HP. The enemy who gave you the Seed Coat will gain the same amount of HP that you lost. This Coat lasts for 3 mins, or until you are at 0 or less HP.
moves.name: Leech Seed

moves.effect: Move to and attack the nearest possible target within 25ft. During your next action, move to and Petal Dance the neaarest possible target within 25ft, then you beome Confused. Petal Dance can and will target allies if possible.
moves.name: Petal Dance

moves.effect: Sleep Powder has -5 during Accuracy Check. On hit, the target is Poisoned.
moves.name: Poison Powder

moves.effect: On hit, if you got 18 or higher on Accuracy Check, Razor Leaf is a critical hit.
moves.name: Razor Leaf

moves.effect: Sleep Powder has -5 during Accuracy Check. On hit, the target is put to Sleep.
moves.name: Sleep Powder

moves.effect: When you use this attack you immediately end your turn unless you are within Sunny Weather. During your next turn, or immediately if you are within Sunny Weather, you may target with and roll Solar Beam's Accuracy Check and Damage.
moves.name: Solar Beam

moves.effect: You are healed HP equal to half your Max HP. If you are within Sunny Weather, you are healed HP equal to 3/4ths of your Max HP instead.
moves.name: Synthesis
